metadata.name: File Time Attribute Change
metadata.comment: Detect file time attribute change to hide new or changes to existing files

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/touch')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-t')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-acmr')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-d')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-r'))))

output.summary: Detect file time attribute change to hide new or changes to existing files
